name: Arcana
description: Your Intelligence (Arcana) check measures your ability to recall lore about spells, magic items, eldritch symbols, magical traditions, the planes of existence, and the inhabitants of those planes. This skill reflects studying the theory and practice of magic.
typicalUses: Recall lore about a spell or magical effect
Identify a magic item or its properties
Know information about magical traditions and schools
Recall facts about the planes of existence and their inhabitants
